page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT IN LINTON
page.content: Linton is situated in the most prosperous part of Britain.Some measure of this can be gained by considering the unemployment rate amongst Linton's school leavers over the past decade.This has never risen above 4.7% and is likely to be even lower this year. The village itself offers employment at such places as Cathodeon Crystals, John Glossop Model Makers,Crofton Engineering and through local shops and builders.There is also some farm work.The greatest stimulus to local employment is the city of Cambridge. Being the regional centre it offers many shop and office jobs.It is also a major tourist centre supporting many hotels and catering establishments. An increasing number of jobs are being created in the 'High Tec' industries within the orbit of the university.
